actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to establish standards for the settlement of disputed title claims to certain real properties alleged to be public lands of the United States, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Provides that, in the case of specified lands in the States of Arizona and California, the United States shall be subject to all legal and equitable defenses which are available to a private party litigant under the laws of the State in which the property is located and to which the United States seeks to establish title or obtain relief dependent upon such claimed ownership of land.

titles.title: A bill to establish standards for the settlement of disputed title claims to certain real properties alleged to be public lands of the United States, and for other purposes.
